message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $20,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, $12,000 undervalues the product significantly.  I'm willing to come down to $18,000. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but $18,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $14,000. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, you're getting closer!  I'm willing to settle this negotiation for $16,000. That's a very competitive price for this quality of product.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $16,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,500. I believe that's a fair price considering its value to me.
